alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 11:47AM CDT until September 23 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Miami County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Johnson County in east central Kansas... Northwestern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1147 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cleveland, or 7 miles southwest of Belton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Lee`s Summit, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Peculiar, Lake Lotawana, Lake Winnebago, Cleveland, Baldwin Park, Bucyrus and Stillwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
